Text: aoloffline, don't get me wrong, I'm deeply grateful for the upload. It's just that, well, of all the images available in this movie THOSE are the two you chose?!?!
the text in this film is not in englishnnhttp://bayimg.com/aANJkAaCL

Am I the only one who finds the audio to be horrible in this???  The audio quality is great but the dynamic leveling of the voices is just absolutely fucked.  I've tried 3 sets of speakers now including a 7.1 surround system and I can NOT get it to be listenable.  The music is at like 100db while the voices are at like 20db... it SUCKS :(

Even tried messing with the EQ in VLC to no avail.  Any suggestions anyone?
